Name: Pattern making
Description: Creating patterns for each part of the garment.

Name: Technical design
Description: Creating technical drawings/spec sheets (tech packs).

Name: AQL (Acceptable Quality Limit) testing
Description: Sampling method to assess product quality.

Name: Performance feedback
Description: Evaluating product performance and customer feedback for future improvements.

Name: Sustainability and waste management
Description: Recycling fabric scraps, minimizing overstock, etc.

Name: Defect handling
Description: Repair or rejection of faulty items.

Name: Returns and repairs
Description: Managing faulty items or customer returns.

Name: Material sourcing
Description: Selecting and acquiring fabrics, trims, and accessories.

Name: Prototyping / sampling
Description: Producing first samples for review and adjustments.

Name: Sewing / assembly
Description: Garment construction by machine or hand.

Name: Final inspections
Description: Measuring garments, checking stitching, consistency, etc.

Name: Fabric spreading and cutting
Description: Laying out and cutting fabric using manual or automated methods.

Name: In-line quality checks
Description: Checking garments during production.

Name: Trend research
Description: Analyzing fashion trends, colors, and consumer preferences.

Name: Finishing
Description: Ironing, trimming threads, adding labels, buttons, etc.

Name: Folding and tagging
Description: Adding hang tags, care labels, barcodes.

Name: Warehousing
Description: Storage before shipping.

Name: Shipping & distribution
Description: Delivering to retailers or customers.

Name: Fabric testing
Description: Quality, shrinkage, colorfastness, durability, etc.

Name: Supplier selection
Description: Choosing factories or partners for production.

Name: Packaging
Description: Polybagging, boxing, labeling by SKU and size.

Name: Costing
Description: Estimating total cost per unit (materials, labor, logistics).

Name: Timeline planning
Description: Establishing production and delivery schedules.

Name: Grading
Description: Adjusting the base pattern to create different sizes.

Name: Sample approvals
Description: Fit samples, color approvals, lab dips (for dye accuracy).

Name: Concept development
Description: Sketching ideas, mood boards, and storyboards.

Name: Marker making
Description: Arranging patterns on fabric to minimize waste.

Name: Production planning
Description: Finalizing quantities, delivery dates, and workflow.
